entry.title: Build a blog with Hexo & NexT theme
entry.content:
Recently I built a personal blog w/ Hexo on Github, and selected NexT as its main theme. Here’s some useful information.

How to create my blog?

I used Hexo & github to build this blog. It requires Node.js, git, etc.

For full installation guide you can refer this tutorial.

Hexo is a fast, simple and powerful blog framework. The documentation is here: ENG, CHN.

How to configure my NexT theme?

I didn’t choose the same theme as tutorial above since its too colorful XD. After googling I finally found the best Hexo theme for me – NexT.

  • Github: https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next
  • Guide w/ Chinese: https://theme-next.iissnan.com/

Note that the Chinese guide is a little bit outdated. There are some differences between it and the lateset version. But the guide is still useful to you. Just read the latest config file carefully.

How to write a new post?

Then you can find your new post in YourBlogDirectory/source/_posts/.

Write posts in Markdown (or other markup languages) and Hexo will generate static files with a beautiful theme in seconds.

A concise tutorial for Markdown: https://www.runoob.com/markdown/md-tutorial.html

entry.title: LC7 Reverse Integer
entry.content:
Problem Description

https://leetcode.com/problems/reverse-integer/

My solution

Key Points

  • Modulo operation requires that (a/b) * b + a%b shall equal a.

    Ex: -5 % 3 = -2, -5 % -3 = -2

  • Check whether rev will overflow before every multiplication.
